name: Skyride Paragliding
about: At SkyRIDE USA, we offer a unique and exhilarating flying experience focused on powered hang gliding. Located at Wilotree Park in Groveland, Florida, our school provides a safe and thrilling environment for both beginners and experienced pilots. With over 25 years of experience in hang gliding and trike flying, our FAA Certified Flight Instructor ensures a safety-first approach. Our training includes discovery flights, comprehensive ground school, and hands-on training with the SLSA P&M QuikR 912S Trike. Enjoy stunning views and immersive learning experiences, all set amidst the beautiful surroundings of Wilotree Park. Join us for an unforgettable adventure in the skies.
